subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Laurel Park has banned the entry of horses into the racetrack after a 2-year-old filly tested positive for equine herpesvirus. Only horses from the Bowie Training Center on a Maryland Jockey Club shuttle were allowed to enter the facility. Horses based at Laurel and Bowie were restricted to the grounds.
